EmailTemplate.description: This Template is for GoDirect Feedback Email to case creation
EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Forge Feedback case creation Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.
Your input is invaluable to help us deliver the best solution to meet and exceed your expectations of Honeywell Forge for Business Aviation.
Case number for this feedback is {!Case.CaseNumber}. We will keep you informed with regards to your feedback.
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or need additional support.
Case Ref ID: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
